website_summaries.verdict: A gorgeous lip gloss that has become a customer favorite for all it has to offer: rich color, beautiful shine, and long-lasting wear.
pros: Provides exceptional colors that hold up for hours
Moisturizes the lips without being too sticky
Repeat users say they get frequent compliments when wearing this gloss
cons: Price falls on the higher end of the scale
Some users complain about favorite shades being discontinued

customer_reviews.title: Misbehave!! Yes!! I will!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the texture of this lip gloss!! I have the color Misbehave and this is my second tube. Perfect time texture, no yucky taste or smell. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Dreamydoodles

customer_reviews.title: Old, rancid and small
customer_reviews.text: I do not believe I have ever returned an item to Amazon. This I will return because the smell is rancid - I suspect this is an old sample size...and this is not the standard size of Nars Lipgloss. Some kind of oil or lubricant in this lipstick is rancid. Even tho' the price is hardly worth the trouble to return, I am doing it anyway, simply on principle. It now makes me wary of purchasing lipstick and other locally available cosmetics through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Orindagirl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: OK. To be real. I would have never in my wildest dreams thought to spend this amount on a lip gloss... On a lip gloss! With that being said this was one of the best purchases I've made for make up. This product looks beautiful. I've heard a lot about this manufacturer in the past. This has been my 1st purchase of their product line. The peachy lip gloss is very subtle but gorgeous. There is no stickiness to the product on your lips as with most lip gloss.I will be purchasing more products from this manufacture.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique D

customer_reviews.title: I am not happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: This color is way off! I am not happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product
customer_reviews.text: I am using same gloss from Nars several years, maybe brand was presently changed, from this order gloss sound so different, texture, color,size No try satisfied at all,maybe will return it,but I opened already one from my twp
customer_reviews.author: natalia ippolitova

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it was old or fake I don’t know but I returned this one and bought it directly from MY FAVORITE STORE for over a dollar le
customer_reviews.text: Something seemed off about the packaging & color was completely off and this was NOT the same product as the department stores! Maybe it was old or fake I don’t know but I returned this one and bought it directly from MY FAVORITE STORE for over a dollar less each (due to price matching) and the color was die on correct. Shipping was super fast but you do get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: MD Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: So glad that I received a sample from the department store. I purchased the item and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Good as a cover color not a base
customer_reviews.text: This was ok, was hoping to use as a base, but due to its light application use it more as a shine over top another base lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Kate P.

customer_reviews.title: Awful do not order
customer_reviews.text: When the product arrived it was a sample size not full size. The product also had expired and had a bad odor. I have used this gloss for years So I know that the scent and consistency is not correct. Do not order!
customer_reviews.author: Jillp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This lip gloss is great....not just because of the name either! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Pridgen

customer_reviews.title: Colors are pretty. Lasts long.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried A LOT of glosses and Nars is my fav.
customer_reviews.author: Daughter

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: I'm 53 and thought I was too old for lip glosses. And, I am! But, this one is part gloss and part lipstick, so it's not as gooey and stays on well. I really like the color on me. I have sandy blonde hair, fair skin, and blue eyes and it works well with my coloring.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Packaged in old tube
customer_reviews.text: Not the real lip gloss that you get from NARS. Horrible. Packaged in old tube. Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color - sexy shine
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful natural color - is great on its own or over your favorite lipstick for very sexy shine- love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn R.

customer_reviews.title: Bad supplier
customer_reviews.text: Something is wrong with the product. I get it all the time, but not from this supplier. From this supplier it has a different consistency and smell -- as if they added something to it. The product I received was not useable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nars Orgasm
customer_reviews.text: Nars Orgasm is a nice nude-peachy lip gloss with shimmer. I paired this with the Nars Borneo lip liner (brownish pink). It gives me a little more depth. They both have a good amount of staying power.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Old Lipgloss
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with this product. This color is a discontinued shade and the product had turned. It has a very odd, petroliate smell and has separated. Not at all like a regular Nars lipgloss would have arrived. Disappointed but know now that all products have a shelf life and this one was past it's prime.
customer_reviews.author: Jill N.

customer_reviews.title: Best gloss I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Love this gloss. Goes on smooth. Not sticky and has good staying power. This is my 4th tube. I don't normally re-order a cosmetic item but this is truly a favorite!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Yerhot

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: This product is old. The consistency is like glue. Also, it’s the small travel size at full size price!!
customer_reviews.author: Janay Peters

customer_reviews.title: my favorite is simmer
customer_reviews.text: Ok, doesn't last as long as Lancome Juicy tubes, my favorite is simmer.
customer_reviews.author: B. L. Weaber

customer_reviews.title: This isn't the original NARS lip gloss!
customer_reviews.text: The lip-gloss is not the same quality as the one i purchased at Sephora. The logo is in the wrong place- on tube instead of the top and the lip-gloss tastes like cheap lipstick. disappointed in the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sera

customer_reviews.title: Smells Funny
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because a lot of other people reviewed it, and were obsessed with it. I definitely like the feeling of the gloss, and the application. BUTTT the gloss stinks. It smells so bad, so when it's on your lips- you can actually smell it! I thought it was just mine ...But I looked it up and others have the same review! I don't know if this is a big deal for others, but it makes a difference to me. $26 is a lot for a lipgloss that stinks!
customer_reviews.author: kristinuhhh

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday neutral color !!
customer_reviews.text: Love this color! Neutral pinkish beige with a slight shimmer. I change the color of my hair often and this seems to go with all of them. Feels lightweight and not too sticky at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Foster

customer_reviews.title: OLD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This product is old and the smell is bad. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: S. Conti

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: This Nars lip gloss is not the rich color of the Orgasm blush, which I use daily. Nars needs to work harder to get the color match better. I would not buy again. Just an OK gloss.
customer_reviews.author: tresia

customer_reviews.title: not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I read that Nars made long lasting lip gloss but this product is just like any other lip gloss to me stays on for maybe one hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: T. harden

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite shade for like 13 years!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica’s

customer_reviews.title: The product I received had to have been years past ...
customer_reviews.text: The product I received had to have been years past expired. It had a revolting spell, was thick and sticky, and completely unwearable.
customer_reviews.author: tom farruggia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gloss. Used it over lipstick the day of my wedding!
customer_reviews.author: VA

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't feel like the real Nars brand
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't feel like the real Nars brand. Was also lighter than the original from the store, but still looks ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Graves

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I lost it -- twice-- but I loved it. Not allowing a third at this price
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: smell (smells like petroleum jelly) and consistency are off
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a counterfeit product! The packaging, smell (smells like petroleum jelly) and consistency are off.
customer_reviews.author: L. D.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Leaves your lips pealing after use, don't care for it as much as I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Smith

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It is not the real NARS Supervixen lip gloss, it is a fake
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Krauss

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived broken. The lip brush was broke off the tip.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon G.

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Great color, doesn't dry out lips. Soft natural look. Brought blush in same brand and color. Great for day or night look with a shine clear coat.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rond

customer_reviews.title: Neutral Lipgloss
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a simple neutral with a bit of shimmer lipgloss? This is it!! It beats MAC. NARS IS so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and not too sticky.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like sticky polish and this is not that. I really like this polish and it's not too big to carry in an evening bag. It slips right in. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: LorrieJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color and texture! I love it and would recommend this to all my friends as a great everyday wear!
customer_reviews.author: Montomcat

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!!  It's a travel size gloss!  It is NOT full size!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a full size lip gloss!!! But they charge a full size price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find... just when they have a great product... they stop making it. Have used it for many years
customer_reviews.author: Kit Riley

customer_reviews.title: Love Nars
customer_reviews.text: This color is awesome. Pinkish nude with gold shimmer...very pretty on. I have really fair skin with pink undertones, and this works!
customer_reviews.author: Shay's mom

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT IS FAKE!! The packaging is different and the formulation is off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Lip Gloss
customer_reviews.text: I have darker complexion and this is color is great for me! The lip gloss is perfect - it goes on smoothly and lasts for a while. I would recommend NARS lip gloss and this color to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Julzie

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: The item was as described and it was nicely packaged in a gift bag. Very nice color. I love Nars products!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. C

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I was speaking on WGN News in Chicago and needed a juicy lip gloss. This had a great shine to it without glittering up the camera. This lip gloss lasts longer than some of my others, but I still need to re-apply every 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Emac

customer_reviews.title: Overrated and overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This lipgloss was too pale, unflattering, and all nars lipglosses are way too sticky, make my lips peel, smell and taste bad. My go to lip glosses are revlon over the counter lipgloss.
customer_reviews.author: T. Yuan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It tastes like rubber! Is it an expired product? It almost makes me vomit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible taste. Didn't look like the color I have purchased before.
customer_reviews.author: Sleighbelle

customer_reviews.title: Ok, for someone, but not for me
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the nars turkish delight and it is definitely not what I expected. It makes my lips looks kind of dead and I am of an medium to olive complexion. Try it on before you buy it, do not just purchase it online like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Cberna5

customer_reviews.title: nars
customer_reviews.text: ordered this lip gloss because i've used it before and like product very much. also like the color. gloss stays on very well and is not sticky.
customer_reviews.author: rm

customer_reviews.title: Striptease
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and especially the price I got it for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT LIPGLOSS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This lip gloss is so beautiful! It's the perfect shade of a peachy pink. Definitely worth the price! I will definitely purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: barbara sexton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shade of Pink
customer_reviews.text: Being Turkish, I thought the name of this color was fitting (Turkish Delight). So I thought maybe Nars was onto something and this shade would go perfectly with my semi-fair olive skin tone. Well, they were onto something. It is the perfect shade of pale pink. It goes with anything and I love wearing it as my "everyday" go to lip gloss. It has a very subtle non-perfumey smell which I really like. I don't like really strong scented lip glosses that you end up smelling all day giving you a headache. Get this gloss, you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: RoseBudD

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product. The color is perfect and it lasts for many hours. It's the perfect combination of shiny color without being sticky. I will try other shades as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: this is wonderful but smells a little funny. It does give the perfect nudish/pinkish gloss look. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: A&A Mom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colour but....
customer_reviews.text: The colour is pretty but it smells old! You know that smell and taste when you use old lip gloss, well that's how it smells! I don't use it even though its a nice colour!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Croasdale

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Odor and consistency was bad ..... more like Vaseline with the odor of Gasoline.
customer_reviews.author: suzannerus

customer_reviews.title: Received in a timely fasion
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about ordering something I had not yet tried but I liked it so much that I ordered three more and they all arrived timely.
customer_reviews.author: lucia@infowest.com

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this shade because it has lovely shimmer but somehow looks natural on my complexion. (Carmel). Don't miss out!!!
customer_reviews.author: charlene clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great lipgloss, pricey
customer_reviews.text: I like this gloss and it does exactly what I hoped. I bought it to pair with Mac's Angel lipstick and they are beautiful together. I got many compliments of the two together so I'm pleased with the purchase. Very pricey though so not sure I'll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: SCoop

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to find this lip gloss because NARS no longer makes it. I have been looking for 3 years!!! I love everything about this lip gloss. The color is beautiful. It is never sticky feeling. It's AWESOME!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Plowman

customer_reviews.title: but glad I didn't give it as a gift after reading ...
customer_reviews.text: There is not much in it and smelled old. I'm assuming this is just a batch that never sold, and is expired. Oh well, you get what you pay for. It goes on clear with a glittery effect. You have to pump it several times just to get any on the wand. Ill use it, but glad I didn't give it as a gift after reading some of the reviews. Ill continue to use it, until its gone, which I feel will be very soon! :(
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Lip Pefection
customer_reviews.text: Nars Lip Gloss stays on, looks great and lasts long enough for pictures and everything else except eating or drinking.
customer_reviews.author: S. Budd

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color gloss with an awful smell
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Nars lipsticks and I decided to try the gloss. Turkish Delight is one of their more popular colors. It's such a pretty color but the taste/smell is hard to get past. I'm going to look for a similar color in a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amy1978

customer_reviews.title: just an OK gloss
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I love the powder so much. This is the same color, so it is very pretty. But as a gloss, it is very average. It doesn't last long and it feels sticky. It also isn't particularly pigmented. Overall, it is pleasant and it was a good price, but it isn't the amazing product the Albatross highlighter is.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Willis

customer_reviews.title: spoiled - rancid - OLD packagaing
customer_reviews.text: It smells like rancid oil and I should know as I'm a MU artist. I didn't know it was not the current tube packaging when I ordered it. It's being returned.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Like glue, too sticky for me!
customer_reviews.text: way too sticky.. love there stick blush by the same name!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Hill

customer_reviews.title: Love me a great lip gloss which NARS is great
customer_reviews.text: Such the prefect pink and so much better in the new formula
customer_reviews.author: Jenn V

customer_reviews.title: loves it
customer_reviews.text: the other half bought this to make me happy! so when you go for a kiss, you don't have sparkles all over your face, yuck. Sorry but the last thing i want is to continue a converstation elsewhere to have sparkles shining off your face. this lip gloss is the best to prevent that and she likes how it goes one nice and smooth. A winner in my book
customer_reviews.author: O.D.T

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't live up to the hype. Wears off almost instantly.
customer_reviews.text: Looks white until you blend it in well, but then you might as well use any cheap gloss just for the gloss effect with no tint, because that's what you get with this. I like it as a gloss over lipcolor but it is gone in 90 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary I Moore

customer_reviews.title: this is a great color. Not to bright or too dark
customer_reviews.text: this is a great color. Not to bright or too dark, but just right. The sheer factor is perfect too.
customer_reviews.author: jenn g

customer_reviews.title: a decent gloss
customer_reviews.text: To be honest it isn't a great lipgloss. It doesn't last too long. That said, I do like it and the color is nice. But, for the price it should be a little thicker and have better staying power. Its a decent gloss. Its not cheap. So you may be happier with a different brand for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: A dream color
customer_reviews.text: This color is quite deceiving , the color is so attractive, and sexy, nice pigment. A nice dark eye with a little sparkle at nite to mix and your hot.XOXO Love it.Another pointer, add a little sparkle to your lipgloss for nite wear youll shine like the star you are.
customer_reviews.author: shop master

customer_reviews.title: Oh La La!
customer_reviews.text: NARS does it again with this delightful glossy colour. I use this along with a tinted moisturiser and the NARS Laguna bronzer to create a beautiful natural look. I always use the Bettina lip pencil over my whole lips before hand to prevent bleeding and this gives the best colour glide for this lipstick. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Moloney

customer_reviews.title: Just okay -- would be 5 star if it didn't stink
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! But face it, who wants to wear something on their lips that tastes & smells pretty bad? I have to put a strawberry clear gloss over it just to cover that up. But like I said, it is a very nice color though.. and looks different from the bottle color when it's on.
customer_reviews.author: HummingbirdsTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Possibly a used product? Smells like dirty mouth
customer_reviews.text: This lipgloss smells like a dirty mouth. I bought Risky Business and the gloss seems cheap and the wand stinks like bad breath. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Oceantide

customer_reviews.title: Stinks and color is off
customer_reviews.text: Smells strange and the color is slightly off. I'm wondering just how old this is.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Color
customer_reviews.text: The Turkish Delight works as a lip gloss by itself, and as a way to tone down a garish lipstick. It is a nice, soft, pale pink that anyone of any skin color could wear.
customer_reviews.author: WuZetian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product is everything you come to expect from a trusted name like NARS. I also like the regular Orgasm lip gloss but this one has a golden-like effect to it...very pretty. I get tons of complements.
customer_reviews.author: CNW is the clique!

customer_reviews.title: NARS Lip Gloss Dolce Vita
customer_reviews.text: A little too sparkly in my opinion but as it's lip gloss one shouldn't complain. Stays longer than the lipstick version and doesn't smudge. Leaves hardly a print on a white coffee cup which is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this lip gloss. It is a great texture, just the right leek between shiny and matte, and the tube lasts a long time. Female Trouble is a great neutral--tame enough or work, dressy enough for weekends.
customer_reviews.author: DC Girl

customer_reviews.title: But great color, and feels great
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't last long on the lips. But great color, and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: neenee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great peach pink color. Love Nars products, have the blush in Orgasm too. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great lip gloss!
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest lip gloss! It doesn't have a funny taste or smell and stays put for a long time. Try it, you'll love it. I bought Sweet Dreams and looking for another great color! Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Clare

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color...as shown. Not thick or tacky. Will definitely buy more!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Best color.. Discontinued in all major stores
customer_reviews.text: The best color. I wear this year around. It has been discontinued and of course Amazon is the place to find all hidden gems.
customer_reviews.author: MissMA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Have been using this for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: william givens

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty but nothing special.
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty shade, the color of your lips only better. It has nice consistency, smooth not sticky. But for the price it was nothing special. With S& H it was around $35.00. A big price for one basic lip gloss.
customer_reviews.author: gloria mercer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thick and Luster is what I like in a lipgloss and this is it.
customer_reviews.author: NICOLE

customer_reviews.title: nice shade for natural looks
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty shade but it has a bad smell and no taste like generic cosmetics. I would not repurchase unless this brand adds some fragrance or flavor.
customer_reviews.author: melanie lujan

customer_reviews.title: Great lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: I love all of the NARS line products. Each is made up of quality materials and serves its purpose well. This shade will be great for the Spring with just a hint of color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect lip gloss, shiny, and stays on forever! I highly recommend this product to anyone for an all day gloss.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect color for everyone
customer_reviews.text: the smell not so great, but the color and texture is very good. Cost is a little much but buy in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: madeleine

customer_reviews.title: very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice pink shade and love the texture- my only complaint is that I wish it would last longer without having to reapply
customer_reviews.author: Dr Phil Fan

customer_reviews.title: Stolen Kisses
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty color for a nude look. Just what I was looking for and for half the price! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Panda Lover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a great color! I forgot! I need to buy another one :)
customer_reviews.author: Arleen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was pretty good but not as bold or "orgasmic" as its name.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: A little lighter and colorless than I would like. I'm older and my lips don't have much natural color anymore. I was looking for something light (dark lipstick looks too harsh on me now) but this is almost too light. Like all glosses it wears off quickly.
customer_reviews.author: LulaTrixiebelle

customer_reviews.title: Long wearing
customer_reviews.text: I like a long wearing lip gloss; this is good stuff for everyday use. It can be used alone but is best if used with another product.
customer_reviews.author: ingrid van duyne

product_meta.title: Nars Lip Gloss - Orgasm By Nars for Women - 0.18 Oz Lip Gloss, 0.18 Oz
product_meta.description: Color:OrgasmA lip gloss that covers your lips in sophisticated shine and stunning color with its nourishing and smooth formula that lasts. It is designed with a doe-foot applicator that glides across your lips for comfort, precision and an enviable finish.
feature_bullets: This gloss covers your lips in sophisticated shine and stunning color.
It is designed with a doe-foot applicator
It glides across your lips for comfort, precision, and an enviable finish
